synopsis.text:
Soul Phone is a thrilling anime set in a technologically advanced underworld known as the World of Death, where Ghost Messengers serve as powerful agents responsible for managing the life and death of all living beings. Kang-lim, a skilled Ghost Messenger, is sent to the human world to capture stubborn ghosts who refuse to move on to the afterlife. However, a mishap during his mission results in Kang-lim being trapped inside his own mobile phone.

Enter Little Kang-lim, a young boy with exceptional spiritual abilities who stumbles upon the enchanted phone. With his unique powers, Little Kang-lim releases Kang-lim from his mobile prison, sparking the beginning of an epic adventure. Together, the duo navigates between the realms of the living and the dead, encountering various challenges and mysterious pursuers along the way. Join Little Kang-lim and Kang-lim as they embark on a thrilling journey filled with action, suspense, and supernatural encounters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
